sentences.sContent: Students and intellectuals have been in the vanguard of revolutionary change in China.
sentences.sCn: 学生和知识分子一直是中国革命变革的先锋。

phrases.pCn: 先进技术，先进生产工艺；万古科技

trans.tranCn: 前锋, 先锋, 领导者
trans.tranOther: the leading position at the front of an army or group of ships moving into battle, or the soldiers who are in this position
